# finish()

**Instance Method**

Indicates to the AVAssetWriter that no more buffers will be appended to this receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
func finish()
```

## Appending captions

- **append(_:)**: Suspends until the input is ready for more media data, then appends the caption group.
- **append(_:)**: Suspends until the input is ready for more media data, then appends the caption.
- **appendImmediately(_:)**: Appends the caption group synchronously if the input is ready for more media data.
- **appendImmediately(_:)**: Appends the caption synchronously if the input is ready for more media data.
